00014 /* This grabs a simple screenshot */
00015 -(NSBitmapImageRep *) getScreenshot{
00016         CGImageRef screenShot = CGWindowListCreateImage(CGRectInfinite, kCGWindowListOptionOnScreenOnly, kCGNullWindowID, kCGWindowImageDefault);
00017         NSBitmapImageRep *bitmap = [[[NSBitmapImageRep alloc] initWithCGImage:screenShot] autorelease];
00018         CGImageRelease(screenShot);     
00019         return bitmap;
00020 }
